aliases.name: undo
aliases.command: cls; git reset && git clean -xfd && git checkout . && npm i
aliases.description: resets branch to last checked in state

aliases.name: push
aliases.command: cls && gittey pull && gittey build && gittey test && git push && git push --tags
aliases.description: performs a git push if tests are passing

aliases.name: save
aliases.description: performs a git push if tests are passing

aliases.name: test
aliases.description: runs tests on on success commits the code

aliases.name: build
aliases.command: cls; npm run compile && gittey docs
